txt.en: Many foes await those who dare enter the fortress of Durthang, home to the Captain of the Pit.
You have successfully braved the fortress of Durthang and collected many orders of the enemy there.
Completed Durthang: Order of the Pit.

An urgent notice hangs from the board:

'Many foes in the fortress of Durthang carry orders of how they are to serve the Captain of the Pit. A brave adventurer is needed to collect these orders. Seek out Candúr in Udûn to learn more.'

<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Durthang: The Dark Spire to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
Candúr can be found in Udûn.\n\nYou should talk Candúr.
Complete Durthang: Order of the Pit
